cat > /home/srb/.srb/.MdasEnv << 'EOF' mdasCollectionName '/home/linuxsrb.sdsc' mdasCollectionHome '/home/linuxsrb.sdsc' mdasDomainHome 'sdsc' srbUser 'linuxsrb' AUTH_SCHEME 'ENCRYPT1' srbHost 'localhost' srbPort '5544' defaultResource 'unix-sdsc' SERVER_DN '/C=US/O=NPACI/OU=SDSC/USERID=srb/CN=Storage Resource Broker/Email=srb@sdsc.edu' EOF
cat > /home/srb/.srb/.MdasAuth << 'EOF' iwannasrb EOF
cat > /home/srb/data/mcatHost << 'EOF' # The MCAT enabled host file. # Line 1 is the host address of the MCAT enabled host. srb.sdsc.edu # Line 2 is the AUTH_SCHEME used to connect the MCAT enabled server. # valid schemes are : PASSWD_AUTH, SEA_AUTH, SEA_ENCRYPT, # GSI_AUTH, GSI_SECURE_COMM ENCRYPT1 # Line 3 is the Dn of the MCAT enabled server. /C=US/O=NPACI/O=DICE/UID=srb/CN=Storage Resource Broker/Email=srb@sdsc.edu EOF
cat > /home/srb/data/hostConfig << 'EOF' localhost EOF
PORTCFG=/home/srb/bin/runsrb gawk ' \ /srbPort=/ { \ printf("srbPort=5544"); \ printf("\n"); \ next; \ } \ { \ print $0; \ }' $PORTCFG > /tmp/port.cfg mv /tmp/port.cfg $PORTCFG chmod 755 $PORTCFG chown srb:srb $PORTCFG
